Helen McGuire

  1. Foster Name: Agnes H.
  2. Foster Family: Albert and Anna Frey Billerbeck
  3. Location of Family: Platte County, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 23 mos.
  7. Date of Birth: 1/6/1910, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 7/20/2002
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Agnes Helen Widhalm
  11. Spouse Name: Albert J. Widhalm
  12. Source: Crossroads, Sept-Oct 2000, p. 18; Eloise Thomsen files; Crossroads, Jul-Aug 2002, p. 7; Charlotte Endort, By Train they Came: Fragile Excess Baggage vol. 2 (Denver: Outskirts Press, 2007), n.p.; Omaha World Herald [undated]; OTR 16; Humphrey Democrat, 22 December 1911.
